name: Sweet Candy Witch - Match 3 Puzzle Free Games
name_original: Sweet Candy Witch - Match 3 Puzzle Free Games
description:
Journey with lovely witch Arya to find the best candies in the world. Swap and match 3 or more of identical colorful candies to blast. Create as many sweet boosters as you can to clean up the plate. Show off your skills in Sweet Candy Witch.

Play with more than 3 million players. Candy Witch is a match 3 puzzle game that you can't stop, you will love it too, you can play without wifi, whenever and wherever.

Features:
- NO LIFE LIMIT
- THOUSAND LEVELS in Sweet Candy Witch this addictive match 3 puzzle game  
- New Match 3 Gameplay: swap and match to make candy crash, help Arya make delicious candy in the magical world
- Challenges and addicted levels
- Casual game,Time killer and addictive!
- Vivid candy graphics and in-game experience
- Super fun puzzle levels and fresh gameplay, great for brain training
- Addictive match 3 puzzle game
- FREE GAME for everyone
- Spin the Daily Booster Wheel for a tasty prize 

Start and spread the fun in Sweet Candy Witch for FREE now!

How to play:
- Swap and match more than 3 identical candies to smash
- Make special candy combos to help you burst various barriers
- Collect the golden key to help with the tough situation
- Be careful about the obstacles: Chocolate, Ice cube, Cream, Cake etc.
- Gather enough candies to win before you run out of moves
- Save the kitten by eliminating the candy
- Looking for stone statues buried in ice cubes
